comments.raw_text:
See testcase, steps to reproduce:
- Press th ctrl-right arrow key

Notice how the caret moves in the table cell.
It should first stop before the input type=radio, then move after the input type=radio, then move before the caption text, then move after the caption text, then move in the table cell.

This doesn't look like a (recent) regression, I can see it in builds from 2005.

Btw, I noticed that the table resizer is not positioned correctly, that is bug 466650.

Btw, I also noticed that you can't move out of the table cell, while pressing the left arrow key.

Also, I noticed that you can't move in the caption text at all, with pressing the up arrow key, while the caret is in the table cell, or with pressing the down arrow key, while the caret is above the caption.
